channel.title: AVRFuses Changelog
channel.description: Changes and updates for AVRFuses by Jason von Nieda

item.title: Version 1.5.0
item.description: <li>Adds a new Projects menu that makes it easy to manage settings for various projects. <li>avrdude now runs in the background so that the UI does not lock up during operations. <li>Thank you to @trol73 for these nice improvements!

item.title: Version 1.4.13
item.description: <li>Fixes a crash in the auto detect function.

item.title: Version 1.4.12
item.description: <li>Rebuild of 1.4.11 with support for older versions of OS X.

item.title: Version 1.4.11
item.description: <li>Adds Auto Detect for device type. Thank you to @trol73 for this feature!

item.title: Version 1.4.10
item.description: <li>Updates device definitions to latest. No code changes.

item.title: Version 1.4.9
item.description: <li>Adds the ability to copy text from the log window along with an edit menu for same. Thanks @ascorbic!

item.title: Version 1.4.8
item.description: <li>Fixes a bug where enumerated values would not have a full description shown. Thanks Luke! <li>Fixes a bug where enumerated values with high masks would sometimes have the wrong value. <li>Makes the window wider by default to account for longer value names.

item.title: Version 1.4.7
item.description: <li>Note: This replaces 1.4.6 from one day ago which had several horrible bugs. <li>The first new release is almost four years! Thanks for all the feedback, and keep it coming! <li>Integrated new part information. <li>Added text fields showing current fuse values and which allow you to type in a fuse value to have it loaded into the checkboxes. <li>Added bit clock option, needed when programming slower devices with some programmers.

item.title: Version 1.4.4
item.description: <li>Added avrdude command line logging to log window at the request of several users. This is configurable via the Preferences. <li>Integrated new part information. <li>Added some coloration to different log messages to help differentiate what is happening. <li>Added .eep to the list of acceptable file types for EEPROM read/write/verify. <li>Upgraded Sparkle framework to current version.

item.title: Version 1.4
item.description: <li>Fixed issue with checking for updates on startup not being disableable. <li>Made window resizable. <li>Cleaned up avrdude argument building code. <li>Made port optional; required for some programmers. <li>Made port a drop down containing common ports found on the system for easier selection. <li>Added setting for baud rate; used for serial based programmers. <li>Started work on Lock Bits editor but decided to hold it for 1.5. This release needed to get out now. Lock Bits removed for now.

item.title: Version 1.3
item.description: <li>Added avrdude error logging to log window on operation failures. <li>Added support for automatic updates using Sparkle.
